mean_cn: vi. 受腐蚀，遭侵蚀；  vt. 腐蚀，侵蚀，损害，削弱
mean_en: to gradually destroy (something) or to be gradually destroyed by natural forces (such as water, wind, or ice)
word_etyma: e离开 + rode 腐蚀 → erode 腐蚀的
sentence: The rocks have been gradually eroded by the wind over time.
sentence_trans: 随着时间推移，这些岩石逐渐被风侵蚀了。
